content:
From: kubraaksoy22@gmail.com
Dear all,

I got two errors while opening Isabelle that cause an inactive prover process.
The error screen shows:

Build started for Isabelle/HOL ...

Ignoring bad database "/home/k/k_aksoy/.isabelle/Isabelle2021-1/heaps/

polyml-2.9_x64-linux/log/Pure.db
Building Pure ...
*** Naproche-SAD server failure
*** Naproche-SAD: failed to create OS thread: Resource temporarily unavailable
Return code: 2 (FAILURE)

Session build failed -- prover process remains inactive!

What can I do for solving this issue?
Thanks for your help

Regards,
Kubra

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
This looks like a general existence failure of the Isabelle/Pure sessions
image (Pure.db).

Maybe something is wrong with your download, or maybe there was a file-system
problem while extracting the downloaded tar.gz

Makarius

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Additional note: you should purge the
/home/k/k_aksoy/.isabelle/Isabelle2021-1/heaps directory.

Makarius

Thank you for the response. Now, I am facing again same error, but not showing the specific path. Attached you can find related ss.

Naproche-SAD server failure
Naproche-SAD: failed to create OS thread: Resource temporarily unavailable

I tried to purge .isabelle and build again, but it did not work.

If you have any further suggestions to solve this issue, I would be happy.

Thanks in advance.

Regards,
Kubra

error-3.png
